name: ColorShape
description:
The goal is simple: drag the matching color and shape to the central figure to get maximum amount of points in 60 seconds.

Reach the top of the leaderboard with three game modes:

- Color: There is only one shape so you only need to worry about the color.

- Shape: There is only one color so you need to focus on the shapes.

- Color & Shape: The final mode combining shapes and colors.

Did you drag the wrong color or shape to the center? Don't worry, use a life and continue playing!
